name: unexpectedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 in a way that is not expected: Their campaign was unexpectedly successful. She showed up unexpectedly at the match. See
unexpected
More examplesFewer examplesHe went on holiday to Spain, where he died unexpectedly.Her request won an unexpectedly large amount of support.He retired unexpectedly from work in July.Unexpectedly, nobody complained.
